title: El Lago
subtitle: The Lake
meta_desc: Learn water vocabulary in Spanish (lago, tranquilo, grande, azul) with audio pronunciation and word highlighting. Ages 2-5.
keywords: learn Spanish preschool, Spanish water book, el lago Spanish, bilingual children books, Spanish vocabulary kids

pages.title: El Lago
pages.prompt: A serene mountain lake with reflection of trees and sky, calm water surface, professional landscape photography, beautiful natural lighting, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: El lago es tranquilo.
pages.prompt: A perfectly still lake surface reflecting clouds like a mirror, peaceful scene, professional landscape photography, soft natural lighting, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: El lago es grande.
pages.prompt: An expansive lake view showing its vast size, wide perspective, professional aerial photography, clear day lighting, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: El lago es azul.
pages.prompt: A stunning blue lake with mountains in background, vibrant blue water, professional landscape photography, bright sunny lighting, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: Los patos nadan en el lago.
pages.prompt: Ducks swimming peacefully on a calm lake, beautiful reflections, professional wildlife photography, natural lighting, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: Puedo pescar en el lago.
pages.footer: I can fish in the lake.
pages.prompt: A fishing scene at a peaceful lake, someone holding a fishing rod, professional photography, golden hour lighting, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.
